\dOkay, since this is a serious competition, I think\nwe should all plan separately.\d%K%P
The three of them had always stuck together to\nkeep an eye on each other, but Yukari's plan was\nto split them up.%K%P
\dI'll be using the kitchen, so none of you are\nallowed in.\d%K%P
\dAnd I have things to attend to, so I'll be\nleaving.\d%K%P
\dUh-huh. You two do your best now.\d%K%P
\dEheheh, but if you lay even a finger on Akira...\nHehehe...\d%K%P
She didn't need to say anything more than that\nmenacing 'Eheheh' to get her point across before\nshe left.%K%P
\dYikes. Is anything scarier than that 'Eheheh' of\nhers?\d%K%P
\dShe sounds like she could snap in an instant.\d%K%P
\dRelax. She'll be fine.\d%K%P
\dHey, shouldn't you be warning me, too?\d%K%P
\dDo I need to?\d%K%P
\dNah, I guess now's not the time for that anyway.\d%K%P
She spoke so matter-of-factly as she turned to her\nlaptop.%K%P
\dPlus, I'm not about to lose to either of them.\d%K%P
\dWhat better way to liven the festival than to\nbring in boatloads of cash?\d%K%P
\dIf that's the angle you're going for, you probably\ndo have the advantage.\d%K%P
But it wasn't going to be easy.%K%P
For one thing, Kaede already had more than a few\nworshipers.%K%P
\dYou think Kaede has the upper hand here?\d%K%P
\dSilly boy. No matter how many locals love her, if\nwe bring in tourists that won't matter one bit.\d%K%P
\dWe're way out in the middle of nowhere here. You\nreally think people are going to show up?\d%K%P
During the day, the Shiraito Falls drew in some\ntourists out to see nature.%K%P
But we'd be voting at the end of the festival, late\ninto the night. It was hard to imagine anyone\nhanging around that long.%K%P
\dI'll figure out a way, don't you worry.\d%K%P
\dI'll start with some posts online, yeah? Get some\nPR in the works.\d%K%P
\dDo you actually have any ideas yet?\d%K%P
\dI'm thinking of using Kaede in my plans.\d%K%P
\dHeaven only knows what Yukari is scheming, but\nI've got a pretty good idea what Kaede is going to\ndo.\d%K%P
\dThink about it - she headed straight for the\nkitchen. Maybe she's whipping up a special festival\nmenu?\d%K%P
That did seem likely.%K%P
Kaede used to be a bit rough around the edges, but\nshe was dependable.%K%P
We could rest assured that she was taking a simple\napproach, and wasn't planning on pulling any\nstunts.%K%P
\dSo I'm thinking of using her to my advantage, and\ndrawing people in for the food.\d%K%P
\dShe'll do all the hard work, and I'll draw the\ncrowd! Just the minimum amount of effort you'd\nexpect from me, right?\d%K%P
\dYou amaze me with your crookedness.\d%K%P
Kaede was too innocent to be anything but happy at\nthe prospect of Shion 'working together' with her.%K%P
But Shion was aiming to take all the credit.%K%P
\dOf course, if she ever caught on to me, I'd be\nscrewed.\d%K%P
\dSo keep this all on the down-low, would ya?\d%K%P
\dYou keep my secret, and I'll make it up to you.\d%K%P
With that she left the room.%K%P
Apparently she was preparing something for me.%K%P
She was trying to buy my silence, but I hadn't\nplanned on snitching anyway...%K%P
\dOkay, ready!\d%K%P
\dTa-da! This is for keeping quiet!\d%K%P
\d...Huh?\d%K%P
Shion was standing there with an apron on for some\nreason.%K%P
\dSo...are you going to cook for me or something?\d%K%P
\dOf course not! Just LOOK! Nothing under this\napron!\d%K%P
She jumped around to make her point, and the cute\napron fluttered about.%K%P
I saw no sign of clothing beneath it.%K%P
\dOh, do you want me to turn around so you can get\na better look?\d%K%P
\dNo, no. I get it. Just stay still.\d%K%P
\dOh come on, I know you're a butt guy!\d%K%P
\dWhat! Who? Me?\d%K%P
Okay, so I had complimented her on her behind\nbefore.%K%P
But I didn't mean it in that sort of way.%K%P
\dWell how about a little side boob then?\d%K%P
As she twisted, I caught sight of her body, from\nher side to her breasts.%K%P
Shion wasn't exactly what you would call curvy, but\nshe had her own charm.%K%P
\dHeh, enjoying the view?\d%K%P
\dReady for my finisher?\d%K%P
\dOpen sesame!\d%K%P
She pinched the ends of the apron and started to\nlift it up.%K%P
Not all the way, of course, but just far enough to\nbe on the very edge of being revealing.%K%P
\dShion, you really...\d%K%P
\dWhaddya think? Getting all worked up?\d%K%P
\dAny more, and I'm not sure I could hold myself\nback.\d%K%P
\dWell that's kind of what I was hoping for.\d%K%P
\dCould you at least pick a better time or place?\d%K%P
\dSo I should sneak up on you in the middle of the\nnight like Yukari? I'm not sure Kaede would like\nthat.\d%K%P
\dShe's stronger than she looks, too.\d%K%P
\dThere's a whole legend about how she got into\nthis, like, sumo battle with another Goddess before\nand sent her home crying.\d%K%P
\dYikes...\d%K%P
The place that legend was said to have occurred\nwas still a barren wasteland with a blood red hot\nspring today.%K%P
It was only a legend, of course, but when you live\nwith someone from said legend, it feels a lot more\nreal.%K%P
\dThat's why I figured now was my best chance.\d%K%P
\dShe's always so worried about Yukari that she\nnever leaves your side.\d%K%P
Which had stopped Shion from pulling anything, too.\nUntil now.%K%P
\dWinning our little competition will be easy.\nWinning your heart, not so much.\d%K%P
\dYou may not have realized this, but I can be\npretty selfish.\d%K%P
\dI make sure I get what I want, no matter what it\ntakes.\d%K%P
\dSo prepare yourself, Aki!\d%K%P
\dAaand that's all for now! That was your payment.\nHaha, how embarrassing! Catch ya later!\d %K%P
She said what she had to say and then took off.%K%P
\dYou were embarrassed that whole time?\d%K%P
She had strutted out like she had not a care in the\nworld, but I guess she had just been playing tough.%K%P
\dShe's hard to read, that one.\d%K%P
Shion might play dirty and use the occasional\nunderhanded tactic, but you couldn't hate her for\nit.%K%P
She was still a good Goddess at the core.%K%P
She would definitely work hard to make this\nfestival a success.%K%P
No matter how it might turn out in the end, I could\nat least commend her on that.%K%P
